title: Dialog Home Broadband Introduces Exclusive Data Plans for Entertainment & Gaming Enthusiasts
body_lines: Delivering the essentials required for non-stop entertainment, powered by fast and reliable internet, Dialog Home Broadband introduced a range of affordable postpaid and prepaid data plans exclusively designed to satisfy all entertainment and gaming enthusiasts.

Customers can now enjoy Unlimited Data for Netflix and the ViU App along with 100GB for Apple TV, Amazon Prime, and Spotify for just Rs.1,299 +taxes (valid for 30 days). The 7-day plan of the same is priced at Rs.499 +taxes, offering Unlimited Data to stream movies and TV shows via Netflix and the ViU App with an additional 20GB allocated for Apple TV, Amazon Prime and Spotify. Furthermore, the Music Data Plan provides customers 10GB Anytime Data for 30 days to listen to music exclusively on Spotify for just Rs.179 +taxes.

In addition to this new range of entertainment plans, Dialog Home Broadband by Dialog Broadband Networks (Pvt) Ltd, a fully-owned subsidiary of Dialog Axiata PLC, further empowered prepaid and postpaid users with Gaming Data plans starting from Rs. 499/- to the delight of gamers island-wide and Work & Learn Data Plans starting from Rs. 495 to facilitate the agile working & YouTube requirements of customers in the new normal.
More information on these data plans can be accessed via https://www.dialog.lk/hbb-data-add-ons
